Title: Series: Old Testament Illustrations
Description: The tenth plague: death of the firstborn; on the left a prince lying dead on the floor, having fallen off the chair behind him. Running diagonally from left foreground to right background a city, to its right several bodies in an open field. Letterpress on verso visible. Here illustration to 'Chronica, Beschreybung und gemeyne anzeyge, Vonn aller Wellt herkommen....', Frankfurt: Christian Egenolph, 1535. 1533 Woodcut
Bibliographic references: Pauli 1901-11 / Hans Sebald Beham: Ein Kritisches Verzeichniss seiner Kupferstiche Radirungen und Holzschnitte (291)
Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (I.448.12)
Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (pp.166-7)
Associated titles: Chronica, Beschreybung und gemeyne anzeyge, Vonn aller Wellt herkommen
